page.title: 15FOOD SHOPS IN HANSLOPE
page.content: THERE ARE THREE FOOD SHOPS IN HANSLOPE. THEY ARE CALLED TOMPKINS BUTCHERS, HANSLOPE SUPPLY STORES AND SPAR GROCERS.TOMPKINS BUTCHERS WAS BUILT ABOUT 200 YEARS AGO.ITS OWNER IS R TOMPKINS AND ITS ADDRESS IS 39 GOLD STREET,HANSLOPE.ITS OPENING TIMES ARE MONDAYS TO FRIDAYS 8.00-6.00 AND SATURDAYS 8.00-1.00.THEY GET THEIR SUPPLIES FROM CATTLE MARKETS AND 4 PEOPLE WORK THERE.SPAR GROCERS IS OWNED BY G SANDWA .ITS ADDRESS IS 22 HIGH ST.ITS OPENING DAYS ARE MON-SAT.ITS OPENING TIMES ARE MON-FRI 8.30-1.00 2.00-6.00 SAT 8.30-1.00 AND 2.00-5.00.THEY SELL GROCERIES AND 4 PEOPLE WORK ON THE PREMISES.HANSLOPE SUPPLY STORES IS OWNED BY A S DAVIDSON ITS ADDRESS IS 6 GOLD ST AND ITS OPEN DAYS ARE MON-SAT AND THE BUILDING WAS BUILT IN 1921. THEY HAVE ABOUT 150 CUSTOMERS A DAY AND 4 PEOPLE WORK THERE
